programlisting:
def delete_faces(self, face_ids): """ Deletes faces from the collection.
:param face_ids: The list of IDs of faces to delete. :return: The list of IDs of faces that were deleted. """ try: response = self.rekognition_client.delete_faces( CollectionId=self.collection_id, FaceIds=face_ids) deleted_ids = response['DeletedFaces'] logger.info( "Deleted %s faces from %s.", len(deleted_ids), self.collection_id) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't delete faces from %s.", self.collection_id) raise else: return deleted_ids
